attributes.action: To provide much need humanitarian aid to The people of Yemen.
attributes.additional_details: Yemen is home to an ancient civilisations with historical ties to the United Kingdom, with many of there citizens being born in Aden then British Protect. These ties are not forgotten especially now in Yemen’s greatest moment of need. Yemen is in need of many supplies medical and food. We want the government to help provide these and encourage global partners and allies to do the in doing the same.
attributes.background: To provide much needed  medical and humanitarian aid and support to Yemen. These supplies are very much needed to combat the quadruple threat of a Covid pandemic, a cholera epidemic, a famine and an on going civil war. This is a situation where children are disproportionately the victims.
